amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 115-785 to increase Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide funds by $5 million to provide for additional training of Special Operations Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Hudson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
